The best swedish translation (and one of the best foreign translations ever) of the Koran is that of Muhammad Knut Bernstrรถm called "Koranens budskap". 

The audio book rights have been bought by a publisher but it has never been published as an audiobook yet. The book itself is worth picking up though since it contains a lot of footnotes and explanations in swedish.
